reddit.com/2015/04/just-put-your-money-i.title: Just put your money in the market because you can't time the market.
reddit.com/2015/04/just-put-your-money-i.snippet: Is this a joke? Just don't bother trying to time the market? There are definitely better times to start investing than others. Look at a 20 year chart. The market goes through a recession/correction about every 7 years. That's when you should go in.
